title: Mathematical Physics - Eugene Butkov
description:
-+-----------------------------+-

A _good_ book not found (well, until now!) in the usual math/phys/ ebook bundles that are spread all over the net.  


Beautiful down to earth, problem solving oriented approach to math, not the usual impotently strict bullshittin&#039; "see how the notation works" approach with useless proofs and fancy gotic letters and thingz ...


ch1: Vectors & Matrices
ch2: Complex analysis
ch3: ODE 2nd order
ch4: Fourier series
ch5: Laplace transform
ch6: Concepts of theory of distributions
ch7: Fourier transform
ch8: PDEs
ch9: Special functions
ch10: Finite=dim Linear spaces
ch11: Infinite-dim Linear spaces
ch12: Green&#039;s functions
ch13: Variational methods
ch14: Travelling waves, Radiation, Scattering
ch15: Perturbation methods
ch16: Tensors

-+-----------------------------+-

So ::enjoy::
